room_title: Escape room "Escape from Wonderland" by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: Wonderland was a lot of fun. We had many laughs along the way! The staff was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Wonderland" by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: Such a great time! My best friend who organized the 'Wonderland' room, even made it all the way through and she's 9 months pregnant! Great staff too!!

room_title: Escape room "Escape from Wonderland" by Escape Room Adventures WNY in Buffalo
review: Of the five different escape rooms that we've done, this one was the best! We had a group of 6 and made it out of Escape from Wonderland in 48 minutes. All of the important details like thorough prep, enthusiastic staff, and fun/challenging puzzles were covered so we had a blast! We'll definitely be coming back for another room soon!!
